stories.text:
(The radius of the universe) / (the Compton wavelength of an electron / 2pi) = (the proton charge radius) / (the proton Schwarzschild radius).

https://www.wolframalpha.com/input/?i=%2813.831+billion+years++speed+of+light%29+%2F+%28Compton+wavelength+of+electron+%2F+%282pi%29%29

https://www.wolframalpha.com/input/?i=%288.414++10%5E-16+m%29+%2F+%282++G++proton+mass+%2F+c%5E2%29

They're identical

stories.text: We recently launched Pastime.LIVE, we connect seniors (mostly boomers)in small video chat groups (3-4 participant),started doing this for each day On 6:00 PM EST) to solve liquidity, so far going amazingly well (retention and engagement are fantastic and best part of it, its really doing something good (people enjoy it - when they don't have many options to have real conversations) , would love to get the community feedback and ideas on scaling (looking also to do B2B2C (not just B2C)  , thanks!   https://pastime.live/
stories.title: Solving Seniors Loneliness
Developer Careers Are Stuck in a Loop – Eat → Sleep → Code → Repeat
